Dialogue.Speaker: enemy2
Dialogue.Text: Ahh! I can't believe I have been beaten by a wandering vagrant such as yourself...

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy3
Dialogue.Text: Someone must teach you a lesson!

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: This next battle will be the toughest yet...

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: I better take some time to prepare this evening...
